postReview.title: Wolves 2-0 Southamption: Cunha inspires hosts to first win of the season
postReview.description: Matheus Cunha bagged a goal and an assist as Wolves beat Southampton 2-0 for their first Premier League win of the season.

QAData.question: Who won between Wolverhampton Wanderers and Southampton on Sat, 09 Nov 2024 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Wolverhampton Wanderers won 2–0 over Southampton on Sat, 09 Nov 2024 15:00:00 GMT.

Matheus Cunha was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.5.
